message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I propose a price of $11,000 for the product. This allows for some flexibility in negotiations while still ensuring a fair return for me. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend a little less.  I'm happy to pay $10,500 for the product.  This would be a fair price for both of us and would allow us to close the deal quickly.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. While I understand your budget constraints, I must respectfully decline your offer. To ensure a mutually beneficial transaction, I propose a price of $10,750 for the product. This price reflects the value I place on the item while also considering your budget. I look forward to your response.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. I'm still a bit too high for my budget.  How about $10,600?  This would be a great compromise and I'm confident we can close the deal.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your financial considerations and am willing to adjust the price further. In light of this, I propose a final offer of $10,650 for the product. This price allows for a fair transaction while accommodating your budget. I hope this proposal meets your expectations, and I look forward to your response.
